text: Hollywood Canteen is a 1944 musical romantic comedy movie. The movie is about two soldiers spending three nights at a Hollywood Canteen. Joan Leslie, The Andrews Sisters and Ida Lupino are in the cast. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1944 musical movies Category:1944 romantic comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Delmer Daves
title: Hollywood Canteen
